title: Chancellor of Austria - Wikipedia
snippet: Twenty-nine people have served as chancellor. The current holder of the office Christian Stocker was sworn in on 3 March 2025 as chancellor. Austria's chancellor chairs and leads the cabinet, which is composed of the chancellor, the vice chancellor and the ministers.

title: New Austrian Government Sworn In — Austria in USA
snippet: On March 3, 2025, Federal President Alexander Van der Bellen swore in a new Austrian Federal Government formed by the Austrian People’s Party (ÖVP), the Social Democratic Party (SPÖ) and the NEOS.

title: Austria's new gov't sworn in after months of political deadlock-Xinhua
snippet: In late February, the People's Party, the Social Democratic Party, and NEOS revived their coalition talks and reached an agreement, leading to the formation of the new government. ■ · Austrian President Alexander Van der Bellen (C) and Leader of the People's Party Christian Stocker (L) attend ...

title: Austria's new government takes office after a record 5-month wait | AP News
snippet: VIENNA (AP) — Austria’s new government took office on Monday, with Christian Stocker taking over as chancellor at the head of a previously untried three-party coalition after a record five-month wait for a new administration.

title: Austria swears in new government, ending five-month political crisis – POLITICO
snippet: Conservative People’s Party (ÖVP) leader Christian Stocker will be the prime minister, with the center-left Social Democrats (SPÖ) and the liberal Neos party also part of the coalition government.
